title: 31 as they relate to the State body to which the following order applies, hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Sections 29 and 31) (Hepatitis C and HIV 
Compensation Tribunal) (Designation) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 13 October 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (sections 29 31) (hepatitis c hiv compensation tribunal) (designation) order 2020 (2) order come operation 13 october 2020

title: 31 as they relate to the State body to which the following order applies, hereby
heading: 2. The Hepatitis C and HIV Compensation Tribunal is designated for the
text_raw:
2. The Hepatitis C and HIV Compensation Tribunal is designated for the 
purposes of section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous 
Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020).
text_norm: 2 hepatitis c hiv compensation tribunal designated purpose section 29 civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (no 13 2020)

title: 31 as they relate to the State body to which the following order applies, hereby
heading: 3. The Hepatitis C and HIV Compensation Tribunal is, for the purposes of
text_raw:
3. The Hepatitis C and HIV Compensation Tribunal is, for the purposes of 
section 31 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 
2020 (No. 13 of 2020), designated and may hold hearings before it by remote 
hearing. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [428] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 October, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [428]

title: 31 as they relate to the State body to which the following order applies, hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Instrument designates the Hepatitis C & HIV Compensation Tribunal as a 
State body for the purposes of holding remote meetings under section 29 of Civil 
Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 

The Instrument also designates the Hepatitis C & HIV Compensation Tribunal 
as a body for the purposes of holding remote hearings under section 31 of the 
Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [428] 5
